content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the klaipeda district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property in a divorce case the applicant had to pay €133 for stamp duty while the defendant had to pay €1757 for stamp duty and €325 for professional fees and stamp duty the court awarded the defendant a vehicle as part of the division of property the court also determined that the applicant is responsible for paying a creditors obligation compensation of eur 1172091 to the defendant the text discusses various aspects of matrimonial property and personal property of spouses including the recognition of community property assets and the separation of personal property the applicant has requested the annulment of the marriage and various arrangements related to their minor child the court will consider these requests and make a decision the court has supported the counterclaim made by one of the parties and ordered the dissolution of the marriage the civil registry registration office has recognized the dissolution of the marriage and the division of property the court has ordered the payment of costs to the state by both parties
